message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SD, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SD 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as the paper is about language modeling for speech recognition. 
- cs.SD (Sound) is also a likely category as the paper deals with automatic speech recognition. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is another possible category as the paper proposes a novel method for rescoring the $N$-best list using bidirectional language models. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is a possible category as the paper deals with improving the performance of automatic speech recognition using language models. 
- cs.SD (Signal Processing) is another possible category as the paper deals with processing speech signals for recognition.
